title: CANCUN: Boat trip to Islas Mujeres.
activities: Located just 15 minutes by ferry from the coast of Cancun, the small island of Isla Mujeres is one of Mexico's best kept secrets.With wild cliff sides, a stunning expanse of palm trees along the coastline, and one of the most beautiful white-sand beaches in the world, the island captivates travelers with its picturesque and relaxing atmosphere.

title: CANCUN: Chichén Itzá: Excursiones desde Cancun
activities: To the north of the Yucatan Peninsula is Chichen Itza, the most impressive and best-restored ruin of the Mayan culture and possibly one of the most famous archaeological sites on the planet.

title: CORDOBA: Word Rally Car
activities: Bus tickets for the Condor - Copina and Cuchi Corral sections. Includes Personal tent with barbecue, beer, wine and Fernet.

title: CORDOBA: Festival Cordobeces
activities: Includes entrance to the event, transfer to the event by car, ticket, plus 3 drinks for the bar in the city of Córdoba.

title: TOKIO: Anime Festival
activities: The most geeky anime festival in the world, in the heart of Tokyo, you will be with a lot of Asian freaks.

title: TOKIO: Tokyo Disneyland
activities: 1-day passport and private transfer from Tokyo to Disneyland or Disneysea

title: Guided tour of the Museums Vatican and Capilla Sixtina
activities: On this guided tour of the Vatican we will visit the Vatican Museums and the Capilla Sixtina. The price includes preferential entrance, so we will skip the endless queues!

title: Disneyland Resort Paris with transfer from the center of Paris
activities: This admission ticket includes convenient transportation from the city so you don't have to worry about how to get to the resort's two theme parks, Disneyland® Park and Walt Disney Studios® Park.

title: Hard Rock Cafe New York in Times Square
activities: At Hard Rock Café New York, every meal is an experience, whether on the road or at lunch. Dine in style and feel like a star at this popular restaurant, located in the heart of New York City's iconic Times Square.
